revised_title: Thermal and Magnetic Properties of Dilute Solid Solutions: Applications to Palladium Alloys
tldr: This article explores the thermal and magnetic properties of dilute solid solutions, focusing on the effects of electron concentration and scattering. The author applies these findings to dilute solutions of Ag, Rh, and Ru in palladium, explaining the observed changes in magnetic susceptibility due to the presence of different metals.
